participant_1.background:
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
I make enough money to support my family and pursue my hobbies.
None of my family members work in the medical field.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.

participant_2.background:
I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom.
I haven't worked at my current job for very long, because I just moved to Vienna.
I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.
I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her.
i m bored with my current lifestyle.

content.text: I'm doing alright! I just moved to Vienna, and I'm still adjusting.
Oh, that's exciting! I've never been to Vienna, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! I'm really enjoying it here. I just got a new job, and I'm starting to make some friends.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're settling in well.
Thanks! I'm still trying to figure out what to do with my free time, though.
Well, what are some of your hobbies?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your free time! I love to read, too.
Me too! I just finished reading a book about the history of Vienna. It was really interesting.
That sounds like a great book! I'll have to check it out.
